name: Mufaddal Hamid
title: Machine Learning Aspirant
summary: Seeking a transition into the AI and Machine Learning industry after accumulating extensive experience in the mobile app development sector. With 4 years of React Native and 3 years of Flutter expertise, I am skilled in React Native, Flutter, NodeJS, PHP, MySQL, ReactJS, and MongoDB. My history showcases a consistent ability to create high-quality applications that consistently meet and surpass client expectations.

experience.description: Worked on developing a restaurant review application for a startup. Made the entire app from ground up, focusing on scalability and reliability. Optimized the speed with sophisticated techniques in Laravel Backend.

Designed and developed 20+ hybrid apps. Trained & mentored interns & freshers. Delivered high-quality and user-friendly applications that meet the customer needs and business goals. Developed high-quality, scalable mobile apps with robust backend.
Worked on various freelance projects involving React Native and Flutter development.

projects.name: CodeMode
projects.description: A learning platform used by institutes for online learning and tests, mainly learning programming (India/US).

projects.name: Bike Doctor
projects.description: An app for mechanics in which the client can ask the mechanic directly via the application and the mechanic can also make payment via the application.

projects.name: Manere Sanus
projects.description: An app for the meditation center where the user can add himself to a course by using points which can be credited via online payment.

projects.name: Bin Bin Recycle
projects.description: An app where the user can request to collect garbage and should upload a photo. The admin will send a garbage collector to collect it and recycle the stuff, and the user will get the payment depending upon the quantity of the garbage.

projects.name: BadshahSoft
projects.description: An Android mobile application developed for Badshah Software Solution, an accounting software provider, to allow their clients to see their accounts in one touch.

projects.name: Rab Office Management
projects.description: A mobile app for Android used by Rab Paints to plan, manage, and engineer their office work, track their agents, including messaging using Firebase.
